title: Projects
text:
Macroeconomics Group Presentation about the Diamond Dybvig model of Bank Runs (finished) : This is a group presentation done in the spring semester of 2024 for a Macroeconomics 2 class that consisted in an article review of “Bank runs, Deposit Insurance, and Liquidity”, by Douglas W. Diamond and Philip H. Dybvig (2020). We received the grade of 19/20 for this presentation.
Microeconomics Group project about modelling class attendance in a Game Theoretical Framework (finished) : This is a group project done in the spring semester of 2024 for a Microeconomics 2 class that consisted in the use of notions seen in class on a chosen case. We choose to do it on strategic interactions between students in a context of class attendance. We received the grade of 17.5/20 for this work.

title: Contact
text: Feel free to reach out to me at my email address: “etienne.comperat” followed by “@sciencespo.fr” !

title: Etienne Compérat
text:
[This website is a work in progress…]
Hello, I am Etienne Compérat, currently a second year student of the Economic Research Master at Sciences Po Paris. I am willing to pursue in Economic research, hence the goal of this website is to allow me to present efficiently my work so far, skills and projects for the future.
I have a Bachelor degree in Political and Social Sciences from Sciences Po with the Economics major and a minor in Central and Eastern European Studies. I have also done an exchange year at the University of California on the Berkeley campus where I have followed the Environmental and Economics Policies major. My research interest are political economy, spatial economy and economic history.
